description: Veragrow is an innovative start-up based in Normandy, founded in 2019 by three engineers passionate about ecological impact. They specialize in creating biostimulants derived from earthworm compost, aiming to enhance agricultural productivity while promoting sustainability. Their flagship products, Veraspida and Veralif, improve plant growth and resilience against environmental stresses. With a focus on research and collaboration, Veragro is poised for growth, targeting both local and international markets to revolutionize agricultural practices.
name: Veragrow
